body_html:
I don't fully understand the fix.

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py

Line 124 in 28c3c5d

_sys.exit(main(argv))

This should be calling main() with some form of argv.

I believe all of TF scripts are written this way, so I don't think it makes sense to modify this one in isolation. Can you provide more information for what's going wrong? Maybe some sample command line and code?

body:
I don't fully understand the fix.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/28c3c5dd38e3b397c2cf0acdaa6388dcbf0349f7/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py#L124

This should be calling main() with some form of argv.

I believe all of TF scripts are written this way, so I don't think it makes sense to modify this one in isolation.  Can you provide more information for what's going wrong? Maybe some sample command line and code?
